---
title: "showing-habitat-change"
---

## Setup

```{r setup, message = FALSE}
library(ggsankey)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r sankey, echo = TRUE}
data <- readr::read_csv("data/habitat_change.csv")

test_long <- data %>% 
  ggsankey::make_long(before, after)

ggplot2::ggplot(test_long, 
                ggplot2::aes(x = x, next_x = next_x, node = node, 
                    next_node = next_node, fill = factor(node))) +
  ggsankey::geom_sankey() +
  ggsankey::theme_sankey(base_size = 16) 
```
